column3: You did very {{c1::well}} in your exams.
I play tennis, but I'm not a {{c1::good}} player.
Have you heard her sing? She sings {{c1::well}}.
I like your hat. It looks {{c1::good}} on you.
I've met her a few times, but I don't know her {{c1::well}}.
Can you speak up? I can't hear you very {{c1::well}}.
